Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class SubWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.SubWindow

  • public class SubWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of subwindows for displaying diagram views. The subwindows can be closed, resized and moved. Cycling between available diagram views is possible too.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SubWindow​()
      Create a new subwindow without duplicating an other one.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDiagram

        public Diagram getDiagram​()
        Returns the diagram associated with this subwindow.

      • getFrame

        public Rectangle getFrame​()
        Returns the frame of this subwindow.

      • getBorderedFrame

        public Rectangle getBorderedFrame​()
        Returns the frame of this subwindow, including its resize borders.
        Returns:
        The frame of this subwindow with a margin of 5 for each resize border.

      • getViewFrame

        public Rectangle getViewFrame​()
        Returns the frame in which views of this subwindow are drawn.
        Returns:
        The frame in which views of this subwindow are drawn.

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int width,
                    int height)
        Set the size of this subwindow to the new size.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width for this subwindow's frame.
        height - The new height for this subwindow's frame.

      • resize

        public void resize​(int fromX,
                   int fromY,
                   int toX,
                   int toY)
            throws InvalidResizeWindowException
        Resize this subwindow from the given start coordinate to the given end coordinate.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the resize.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the resize.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the resize.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the resize.
        Throws:
        InvalidResizeWindowException - The resize was not successful.

      • move

        public void move​(int fromX,
                 int fromY,
                 int toX,
                 int toY)
          throws InvalidMoveWindowException
        Moves the this subwindow horizontally and/or vertically.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the move.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the move.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the move.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the move.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveWindowException

      • addParty

        public void addParty​(int x,
                     int y)
              throws InvalidAddPartyException
        Add a party at the given coordinates in the currently active diagram view.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to add the party at.
        y - The y coordinate to add the party at.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddPartyException - If a party cannot be added at the given coordinates.

      • switchTypeOfParty

        public void switchTypeOfParty​(int x,
                              int y)
        Switch the type of the party at given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the party.
        y - The y coordinate of the party.

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage​(int fromX,
                       int fromY,
                       int toX,
                       int toY)
                throws InvalidAddMessageException
        Add a message from the given coordinates to the given ones.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The starting x coordinate for the message.
        fromY - The starting y coordinate for the message.
        toX - The ending x coordinate for the message.
        toY - The ending y coordinate for the message.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddMessageException - The operation was not successful.

      • selectComponent

        public void selectComponent​(int x,
                            int y)
        Select the component at the given coordinates in this subwindow.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the component that is to be selected.
        y - The y coordinate of the component that is to be selected.

      • getSelectedComponent

        public DiagramComponent getSelectedComponent​()
        Returns the diagram component that is currently active in this diagram.

      • deselectAll

        public void deselectAll​()
                 throws InvalidLabelException
        Deselects the currently selected component.
        Throws:
        InvalidLabelException - If the selected component is active and its label is invalid.

      • selectionIsActive

        public boolean selectionIsActive​()
        Returns whether or not the selection for this subwindow is active (that is, in edit mode).
        Returns:
        True if and only if the selected label is not null.

      • setSelectedLabel

        public void setSelectedLabel​(java.lang.String selectedLabel)
        Sets the temporary label for the active component to the given one.
        Parameters:
        selectedLabel - The new temporary label for the active component.

      • getSelectedLabel

        public java.lang.String getSelectedLabel​()
        Returns the temporary label of the currently active component in this diagram.

      • deleteSelection

        public void deleteSelection​()
        Removes the currently selected component from this subwindow's diagram.

      • moveParty

        public void moveParty​(int fromX,
                      int fromY,
                      int toX,
                      int toY)
               throws NoSuchPartyException,
                      InvalidMovePartyException
        Move the party at the given start coordinates to the given end coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the add.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the add.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the add.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the add.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPartyException - If there is no party at the given start coordinates.
        InvalidMovePartyException - If the party could not be moved to the given end coordinates.

      • nextView

        public void nextView​()
        Switch to the next view.

      • displayView

        public void displayView​(PaintBoard paintBoard)
        Display the currently active view in the given paintboard.
        Parameters:
        paintBoard - The paintboard on which should be drawn.

      • getActiveView

        public DiagramView getActiveView​()
        Returns the currently active view in this subwindow.
        Returns:
        The active view for this subwindow.

      • getViews

        public PList<DiagramView> getViews​()
        Returns the views in this subwindow.
        Returns:
        The diagram views held by this subwindow.

      • closeButtonEncloses

        public boolean closeButtonEncloses​(int x,
                                   int y)
        Returns whether or not the given coordinates lie within this subwindow's close button.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to check with.
        y - The y coordinate to check with.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given coordinates lie within this subwindow's close button.

      • diagramDidEditLabel

        public void diagramDidEditLabel​(Diagram diagram,
                                DiagramComponent component)
        Notify this subwindow that the given component in the given diagram changed.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to which the component belongs.
        component - The component whose label was edited.

      • close

        public void close​()
        Close this subwindow. This unregisters it as an observer.
